Esoterica.Name: YuriHakuEsoterica_QiShaping
Esoterica.Desc: Through this technique the user increases their Max Qi.
Esoterica.EffectDesc: This technique increases their Max Qi.

Esoterica.Name: YuriHakuEsoterica_WaterWalking
Esoterica.Desc: Through this technique the user has to be emitting a constant stream of Qi from the bottom of the their feet and using the repellent force to walk across the water's surface.
Esoterica.EffectDesc: This technique increases the user Speed and Adventure Speed.

Esoterica.Name: YuriHakuEsoterica_SilentKilling
Esoterica.Desc: Through this technique the user learns a soundless method of killing an opponent by quickly attacking their weak points.
Esoterica.EffectDesc: This skill increases the user Artifact Power; Flying Speed; Turn Speed and Trail Lenght.
